404.title: Ooops!
404.subtext: You might want to check that URL again or head over to our

search.title: Search
search.no_results_html: Your search for {{ search }} did not yield any results. Try searching for something else.

product_stock_message.message_html: Hurry, there are only {{ quantity }} item(s) left!

comments.title: Join the discussion
comments.name: Name
comments.moderated: Comments have to be approved before showing up
comments.success_moderated: Successfully posted your comment. It will have to be approved by the blog owner first before showing up.
comments.error: Not all the fields have been filled out correctly

general.title: Shopping Cart
general.empty_cart: You have no items in your shopping cart.

label.note_text: Add special instructions for your order...

header.title: Recently added item(s)
header.empty_cart: You have no items in your shopping cart.

form.title: GET IN TOUCH WITH US
form.post_success: Thanks for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.post_error: Oops, sorry. We were unable to submit your inquiry. Please correct the following and submit again:

activate_account.subtext: Create your password to activate your account.

login.title: ALREADY REGISTERED?
login.description: If you have an account with us, please log in.
login.reset_password_subtext: We will send you an email to reset your password.
login.new_customer_description: By creating an account with our store, you will be able to move through the checkout process faster, store multiple shipping addresses, view and track your orders in your account and more.

orders.none: You haven't placed any orders yet.

issued.title: Here's your {{ value }} gift card for {{ shop }}!
issued.redeem: Use this code at checkout to redeem your gift card

onboarding.product_description: This area is used to describe your product’s details. Tell customers about the look, feel, and style of your product. Add details on color, materials used, sizing, and where it was made.
onboarding.blog_excerpt: Your store hasn’t published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify’s ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.
onboarding.no_content: This section doesn’t currently include any content. Add content to this section using the sidebar.

order_summary.discount_requires_customer_notice: Please submit your delivery information to apply the {{code}} discount code
order_summary.shipping_information_does_not_meet_disco: Your delivery information does not meet the requirements for the {{code}} discount code

shipping.title: Delivery method
shipping.waiting_on_rate_notice: Please wait while we fetch available delivery rates...
shipping.no_rates_for_cart_or_destination_notice: There are no delivery methods available for your cart or destination.
shipping.no_rates_for_country_notice: We do not offer delivery to {{country}}.

shipping_errors.shipping_method: Your cart has been modified and the delivery rate you previously selected no longer applies. Please select a new rate.

thank_you.confirmed_description_html: We have accepted your order, and we are getting it ready. A confirmation email has been sent to {{ email }}. Come back to this page for updates on your delivery status.
thank_you.no_tracking_number: There is no tracking number for this delivery.
thank_you.unfulfilled_items_description: We are currently preparing these items for delivery.
thank_you.login_title: Login to view all delivery details
thank_you.failed_title: We could not deliver your order
thank_you.delivered_description_html: Your order has been delivered to the address you provided. If you haven't received it, or if you have any other problems, please {{ contact_us }}.
thank_you.attempted_delivery_description_html: An attempt was made to deliver your order but it was unsuccessful. Please {{ contact_us }} to arrange another delivery attempt.
thank_you.attempted_delivery_title: An attempt was made to delivery your order
thank_you.out_for_delivery_description_html: Your order is on the delivery truck - expect it to arrive today. If you still haven't received it in the next 2 days, please {{ contact_us }}.
thank_you.out_for_delivery_title: Your order is out for delivery
thank_you.in_transit_description: Come back to this page for updates on your delivery status.
thank_you.in_transit_title: Your order is on the way
thank_you.order_updates_subscribe_to_phone_notific: Get delivery updates by email or SMS

cart.shipping_address_not_required: This cart does not require delivery
